website_summaries.verdict: This cheap SUV cover doesn't skimp on protection.
pros: Adjustable strap prevents this cover from blowing off in the wind
Cotton inner layer protects paint from fading and scratches
Thick PEVA cover fits most sedans well
cons: A few customers reported that the strap was not included

customer_reviews.title: Totally fits a 2003 Subaru Legacy
customer_reviews.text: So I was really paranoid that this wouldn't fit in my car and I didn't want an oversized one. But this fits really well there is little flaps for your side view mirrors and a strap to hold the cover together from the bottom. There's also little reflectors on it so it's has more visibility. The material feels very sturdy. I've bought other car covers in the past and they were really thin and eventually ripped. Overall a really great car cover it's going to help me Preserve my car wash.
customer_reviews.author: Squishmaster

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for price
customer_reviews.text: This cover has a nice fleece interior to protect the paint. It is not "breathable" and made more like a cover for a grill, which suited my needs well. I use it to protect a classic car in my garage from dust and scratches. Nice quality for the price. Mirror pockets were not even close to correct location, but I dont know how they could be unless it was custom and not important to me. I used a hot iron to burn a hole where my antenna goes.
customer_reviews.author: Honest John

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality. Easy to put on and take off. Weight is good, not worried about it blowing off if it’s windy, although the bottom straps are flimsy. Love the light reflecting stripes on the side mirrors and fender. Fits my 2018 Toyota RAV4 perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dodger Mom

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is designed for...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good so far. I purchased this cover to protect my WRX while parked in the hotel parking lot on a recent roadtrip. It fits my car well and it is waterproof. It was relatively easy to put on in a hurry too. The reflective strips are a great safety feature.
customer_reviews.author: WRX

customer_reviews.title: A cost effective cover that accomplishes what you need.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car cover for my Lexus RX 330 because I currently do not have a garage or carport to store it in and I really need to shield it from the weather and elements as best I can. I've had it for several months now and it works great! Very easy to put on and fits my car like a glove. It comes with two securing straps underneath which will keep it from lifting off in the wind, I wish they made the straps a little bit more durable but they accomplish the job. Definitely a great product for the price. -JKH
customer_reviews.author: JKHeflin

customer_reviews.title: This is the best I have ever experienced in quality!
customer_reviews.text: Other covers I have purchased, and there have been many, have ripped so easy, they ware out - like decompose, and only last about a year. This one is all aces! If I should need another, it will be this one! I had to make a hole in the cover for the antenna, and I was careful to use duck tape on both sides before making the hole, and it worked great!
customer_reviews.author: August Schichtel

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I've had several covers for my 2001 Mustang. Most deteriorated after a year or so. This cover is holding up extremely well in all types of weather. It is a little large for the Mustang, actually hangs down to the driveway but the straps keep everything tight. I added a strap in the center which is helpful in real high winds.
customer_reviews.author: K. Plaskocinski

customer_reviews.title: Very tight fit on a 06 Mustang GT Convertible.  But awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: Very tight fit on a 06 Mustang GT Convertible. But awesome quality. Looks very cool and love the quality of the fabric. 2 complaints... strap clips are cheap and broke, very tight fit on my car.
customer_reviews.author: izod

customer_reviews.title: Looked OK at first - fell apart months later.
customer_reviews.text: This faded really bad and got ripped up a few months after use. I would not recommend if you want to cover a car for long periods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good outdoor car cover to have 💪
customer_reviews.text: I am happy that the quality of this piece is so good.It feels durable and fits great. I have a 2008 Toyota Rush-japanese built. I chose the size YL after much reading and researching. Would update you as to how long it lasts but for now it's doing well. The vehicle is outdoors and exposed to the weather elements.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: super happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1999 Chrysler Sebring Convertible that has some discontinued window seal issues. I bought the cover to keep it dry when it rains. It fit really well and so far seems to be waterproof :)
customer_reviews.author: Jax

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for Lexus 250IS
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a Lexus IS250 and was happy to see that it was almost a perfect fit. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Great car cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice cover, soft underside that won't scratch the paint. Secures to the car via straps.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TEARS NEAR STRAPS.
customer_reviews.text: needs more tie down straps blows up in the wind. this is a large car cover. i have the same issue as other people. the cover tears. it's too bad because it is a nice material, the stitching is just poor
customer_reviews.author: jason h.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and easy to use even for a petite female such as myself. However, I find it challenging to fold and stuff it back into its case again.
customer_reviews.author: N. B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best cover ever. Quality great. Easy to put on. Mirror pockets a plus. Reflective strips on do blue looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: M2Baro

customer_reviews.title: Great fit...bad quality.
customer_reviews.text: When first received, I had high regards for this cover...great fit, great value, and great material. Two months later, a few seams are starting to split. The sewing is a little sloppy here and there (the threads seem strong enough, but the material was not guided through the sewing machine properly). I am hoping to have the seller exchange this one, and if successful, will give 5-star rating to the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen V.

customer_reviews.title: Ok product!
customer_reviews.text: Good st first use but heavy for me to carry..but nice n sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Mata

customer_reviews.title: Protects the car from sun and dirt very well
customer_reviews.text: It covers my car completely and fits very snuggly, but the fabric could be a little bit thicker. Cats get on my car and put holes in it very quickly almost within a day or two. Wish this would come in gray.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Mom

customer_reviews.title: It's a perfect fit!!
customer_reviews.text: It's a perfect fit for my 2018 Mitsubishi Eclipse Cross. It's not as thick as others but definitely worth the price.. so far am liking it.
customer_reviews.author: Nel87

customer_reviews.title: Ripped on the third day
customer_reviews.text: Cover ripped on the seem after using it for three days.
customer_reviews.author: phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Quality and performance is much better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Quality and performance is much better than I expected. I have a 2015 BMW 328 IX, Fits Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: S. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Seams ripping
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these. The first one ripped at the seams when it was windy and I took the blame thinking I didn't buy a big enough one. I bought a larger size and only 2 weeks after I started to use it, I came home to find it in the driveway ripped at the seam all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hyundai Elantra 2017
customer_reviews.text: For the car great and helps protect it from the Florida sun!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Covers my Toyota Rava 4 really good. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described. Covers my Toyota Rava 4 really good. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: bluecell stylus pens

customer_reviews.title: seamless is best and FIT.
customer_reviews.text: The car cover is attractive and is a good fit for my 2014 Sonata. The elastic holds the cover on the car, has a strap to hold onto car in storm. Rain leakes through the seams, not really weatherproof. Bedt fit so far, last cover I had was too big and it blew off, costly mistake on my part.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: A bit too big for 2013 Honda Fit
customer_reviews.text: Car cover seemed to fit the dimensions of my 2013 Honda Fit well before I bought. Tightened the straps and left the cover on during winter break. Unfortunately, it seems it is indeed a little too big, allowing the wind to whip the car cover and rip it where the straps connect along the seam. Customer service was very helpful and provided a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Only protects from bird crap
customer_reviews.text: Takes forever to dry and my car still gets wet
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Downs

customer_reviews.title: First time used and it ripped!!
customer_reviews.text: Hello, first time used, a snow and ice storm. The next day when i tried to take off the cover, it stuck to several spots and left the lining residue stuck to my car! Also it ripped holes at those spots! I put the cover on when my car was dry! VERY DISSATISFIED!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas. A.

customer_reviews.title: Cover poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This cover looked great put made very cheaply went to stretch over my car and it tour sent back 2 weeks ago no refund yet
customer_reviews.author: Steven a siliato

customer_reviews.title: Very nice cover but- As soon as we had a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice cover but- As soon as we had a little wind with rain the cover came off and at bottom were tie straps are ripped lose..Wish it had more and better straps to keep tight on suv
customer_reviews.author: michael spurback

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this cover works very well at keeping my car out of the elements and clean dry
customer_reviews.author: Daryl Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 2008 Jeep Lberty
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and fits my 2008 Jeep Liberty great
customer_reviews.author: Experienced buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love the colors
customer_reviews.text: Love it, fit perfectly for my 2nd SUV, love all features that does have.
customer_reviews.author: David Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Im very happy with this cober
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover and give full protection to my SUV Lexus
customer_reviews.author: Rolly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Not WATERPROOF as they advertise. Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How long is it under warranty?
customer_reviews.text: I have had it under a year and it already had a rip?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Cheap temporary solution, don't expect much
customer_reviews.text: This cover was cheap, so expectations have to be relatively low. For about 30 bucks it will protect my SUV, but probably not for very long. It's made of cheap materials, and I'm guessing it won't last. Only time will tell. It's basically thin nylon with a soft lining inside to keep it from scratching the paint. As soon as Mazda comes out with an OEM cover for my 2017 CX-5 this thing will be replaced pronto. In the meantime, it's doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Rene E. Borroto

customer_reviews.title: This cover produced a fungus on my car's roof which ...
customer_reviews.text: This cover produced a fungus on my car's roof which I had to spend money to paint it again. Probably cause I used it in a rainy season, but this don't justify, you don't expect to dry the entire cover each time you want to use it. I will look elsewhere if you live in a rainy/humid climate, the material used could cause fungus in your car paint
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1 star.Falling apart after 8 Months ,poor quality dont purchase.
customer_reviews.text: No Stars ,been on the car since purchased in March , 8 months and the seams are separating. Can barely touch cover and it tears. What a waste of money. Seemed like a good quality cover but definitely not for long term outdoor use. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: slackerzchop

customer_reviews.title: Not good for cold weather
customer_reviews.text: I installed this cover on my car while temperature were still in the 60’s. The cover fits well, tight and protects the car. The vehicle has been sitting outside since the cover was put on it. And as soon as the temperature started to drop, the seams started to rip. Both front are now ripped. Unless you are in a warm climate state, it does not seem this product will hold well
customer_reviews.author: Leglode

product_meta.title: YITAMOTOR SUV Car Cover, Durable Waterproof All Weather Snow Dust Rain Resist Outdoor Full Protection Auto Covers Fit SUV Cars up to 188" L (PEVA, Dark Blue)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars80 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
